user_resources.name: 30 Unit Prompt Files
user_resources.description: Complete curriculum with vocabulary, grammar, and cultural context for each unit

user_resources.name: Ungheni Context
user_resources.description: User will be in Ungheni, Moldova - need regional cultural awareness

user_resources.name: Target Level
user_resources.description: Progress from beginner to A2-B1 conversational fluency

user_resources.name: CSV Format
user_resources.description: Must be compatible with Quizlet import (Front,Back format)

six_hat_analysis.white: We have 30 structured unit files covering progression from basic greetings to A2-B1 conversational fluency. Each unit contains vocabulary, grammar, cultural context, and practice activities. The output must be CSV format compatible with Quizlet import (Front,Back columns). The target user will be living in Ungheni, Moldova, requiring authentic regional cultural awareness and practical conversational skills.
six_hat_analysis.red: This project feels exciting because it's creating a real-world learning tool for someone's actual move to Moldova. There's emotional satisfaction in building comprehensive study materials that will genuinely help with cultural integration. The focus on Ungheni-specific content adds personal relevance that will motivate learning and retention.
six_hat_analysis.black: Key risks include: managing the massive scope of 30 comprehensive units efficiently, ensuring cultural accuracy without direct Moldova experience, maintaining consistent CSV formatting across all files, balancing flashcard brevity with comprehensive content, and potential research gaps about regional Moldovan expressions specific to Ungheni area.
six_hat_analysis.yellow: This will create a complete, progressive learning system specifically tailored for practical use in Moldova. The cultural awareness component will provide real integration value beyond basic language skills. The systematic approach ensures comprehensive coverage while the CSV format makes it immediately usable. This could become a valuable resource template for other Romanian language learners.
six_hat_analysis.green: Alternative approaches could include: thematic organization within units (e.g., formal vs informal cards), adding context clues or cultural scenarios as card examples, creating multiple difficulty tiers per unit, incorporating visual mnemonics, or adding pronunciation hints. Could also research actual Ungheni local expressions through online Moldova forums or cultural resources.
six_hat_analysis.blue: Strategic approach: First survey all 30 units to understand content progression and identify themes. Create standardized CSV template ensuring Quizlet compatibility. Research Moldovan/Ungheni cultural expressions systematically. Process units in logical groups (e.g., 1-10 foundations, 11-20 intermediate, 21-30 advanced). Implement quality control through consistent formatting and cultural authenticity checks.

data.denoised_plan:
COMPREHENSIVE ROMANIAN FLASHCARD CREATION PLAN:

Phase 1 - Foundation & Research (Tasks 1-3):
Survey all 30 unit files to understand the complete curriculum progression, vocabulary themes, and cultural contexts. Research Moldovan Romanian expressions and Ungheni-specific cultural elements to ensure authentic regional awareness. Create a standardized CSV template that ensures Quizlet compatibility while accommodating comprehensive content including pronunciation guides, cultural context, and progressive difficulty levels.

Phase 2 - Systematic Content Creation (Tasks 4-6):
Process units in three logical groups: Units 1-10 (Foundation - basic greetings to daily activities), Units 11-20 (Intermediate - complex conversations and past tense), and Units 21-30 (Advanced - cultural discussions and B1 fluency). Each flashcard set will include vocabulary, phrases, cultural expressions, grammar examples, and regional Moldovan variations. Content will be organized thematically within each unit to support natural learning progression.

Phase 3 - Quality Assurance & Enhancement (Tasks 7-8):
Implement comprehensive quality control including CSV formatting verification, cultural authenticity review, and progressive difficulty validation. Enhance flashcard sets with pronunciation hints, cultural context clues, and practical usage scenarios specific to living in Ungheni. Ensure each unit builds appropriately on previous knowledge while introducing new concepts at sustainable pace toward A2-B1 conversational fluency.
